question: In which nation "Plitvice Lakes National Park", a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is located?
explanation: Plitvice Lakes National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is located in Croatia. It is one of the oldest and largest national parks in Croatia. This national park houses several cascade lakes which collectively forms the Korana River. It is bounded by Mala Kapela Mountain and Pljesvica Mountain within the Dinaric Alps.
